label: Macroeconomics, General
description: Issues related to general domestic macroeconomic policy.

label: Interest Rates
description: Issues related to inflation, cost of living, prices, and interest rates

label: Unemployment Rate
description: Issues related to the unemployment rate, impact of unemployment

label: Monetary Policy
description: Issues related to the monetary policy, central bank, and the treasury

label: National Budget
description: Issues related to public debt, budgeting, and efforts to reduce deficits

label: Tax Code
description: Issues related to tax policy, the impact of taxes, and tax enforcement

label: Industrial Policy
description: Issues related to manufacturing policy, industrial revitalization and growth

label: Price Control
description: Issues related to wage or price control, emergency price controls

label: Macroeconomics, Other
description: Issues related to other macroeconomics subtopics

label: Civil Rights, General
description: Issues related generally to civil rights and minority rights

label: Minority Discrimination
description: Issues related to minority, ethnic, and racial group discrimination

label: Gender Discrimination
description: Issues related to sex, gender, and sexual orientation discrimination

label: Age Discrimination
description: Issues related to age discrimination, including mandatory retirement age policies

label: Handicap Discrimination
description: Issues related to handicap and disease discrimination

label: Voting Rights
description: Issues related to voting rights, expanding or contracting the franchise, participation and related issues

label: Freedom of Speech
description: Issues related to freedom of speech, religious freedoms, and other types of freedom of expression

label: Right to Privacy
description: Issues related to privacy rights, including privacy of records, access to government information, and abortion rights

label: Anti-Government
description: Issues related to anti-government activity groups, such as the communist party and local insurgency groups

label: Civil Rights, Other
description: Issues related to other civil rights subtopics

label: Health, General
description: Issues related generally to health care, including appropriations for general health care government agencies

label: Health Care Reform
description: Issues related to broad, comprehensive changes in the health care system

label: Insurance
description: Issues related to health insurance reform, regulation, availability, and cost

label: Drug Industry
description: Issues related to the regulation and promotion of pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and clinical labs

label: Medical Facilities
description: Issues related to facilities construction, regulation and payments, including waitlists and ambulance services

label: Insurance Providers
description: Issues related to provider and insurer payments and regulation, including other types of benefits or multiple benefits

label: Medical Liability
description: Issues related to medical liability, malpractice issues, medical fraud and abuse, and unfair practices

label: Manpower
description: Issues related to the supply and quantity of labor in the health care industry, training and licensing

label: Disease Prevention
description: Issues related to disease prevention, treatment, and health promotion, including specific diseases not covered in other subtopics

label: Infants and Children
description: Issues related to infants and children, including coverage and quality of care, health promotion, and school health programs

label: Mental Health
description: Issues related to mental health care and mental health disease

label: Long-term Care
description: Issues related to long term care, home health care, the terminally ill, and rehabilitation services

label: Drug Coverage and Cost
description: Issues related to prescription drug coverage, programs to pay for prescription drugs, and policy to reduce the cost of prescription drugs

label: Tobacco Abuse
description: Issues related to tobacco abuse, treatment, education, and health effects

label: Drug and Alcohol Abuse
description: Issues related to alcohol and illegal drug abuse, treatment, education, and health effects

label: Health, R&D
description: Issues related to health care research and development

label: Health, Other
description: Issues related to other health care topics

label: Agriculture, General
description: Issues related to general agriculture policy, including appropriations for general agriculture government agencies

label: Trade
description: Issues related to the regulation and impact of agricultural foreign trade

label: Subsidies to Farmers
description: Issues related to government subsidies to farmers and ranchers, including agricultural disaster insurance

label: Food Inspection & Safety
description: Issues related to food inspection and safety, including seafood, and labeling requirements

label: Food Marketing & Promotion
description: Issues related to the regulation of agricultural marketing and providing information to consumers regarding a healthy diet

label: Animal and Crop Disease
description: Issues related to animal and crop disease, pest control and pesticide regulation, and welfare for domesticated animals

label: Fisheries & Fishing
description: Issues related to fishing, commercial fishery regulation and conservation

label: Agriculture, R&D
description: Issues related to agricultural research and development

label: Agriculture, Other
description: Issues related to other agricultural subtopics

label: Labor, General
description: Issues generally related to labor, employment, and pensions, including appropriations for government agencies regulating labor policy

label: Worker Safety
description: Issues related to worker safety and protection and compensation for work-related injury and disease

label: Employment Training
description: Issues related to job training for adult workers, workforce development, and efforts to retrain displaced workers

label: Employee Benefits
description: Issues related to all employee benefits, pensions, and retirement accounts, including government-provided unemployment insurance

label: Labor Unions
description: Issues related to labor unions, collective bargaining, and employer-employee relations

label: Fair Labor Standards
description: Issues related to fair labor standards such as the minimum wage and overtime compensation, and labor law

label: Youth Employment
description: Issues related to youth employment, child labor and job training for youths

label: Migrant and Seasonal
description: Issues related to migrant, guest and seasonal workers

label: Labor, Other
description: Issues related to other labor policy

label: Education, General
description: Issues related to general education policy, including appropriations for government agencies regulating education policy

label: Higher
description: Issues related to higher education, student loans and education finance, and the regulation of colleges and universities

label: Elementary & Secondary
description: Issues related to elementary and primary schools, school reform, safety in schools, and efforts to generally improve educational standards and outcomes

label: Underprivileged

label: Special

label: Excellence
description: Issues related to education excellence, including efforts to increase the quality of specific areas, such as math, science or foreign language skills

label: Education, R&D
description: Issues related to research and development in education

label: Education, Other
description: Issues related to other subtopics in education policy

label: Environment, General
description: Issues related to general environmental policy, including appropriations for government agencies regulating environmental policy

label: Drinking Water
description: Issues related to domestic drinking water safety, supply, pollution, and additives (e.g., fluoridation)

label: Waste Disposal
description: Issues related to the disposal and treatment of wastewater, solid waste and runoff.

description: Issues related to hazardous waste and toxic chemical regulation, treatment, and disposal

label: Air Pollution
description: Issues related to air pollution, climate change, and noise pollution

label: Recycling
description: Issues related to recycling, reuse, and resource conservation

label: Indoor Hazards
description: Issues related to indoor environmental hazards, indoor air contamination (including on airlines), and indoor hazardous substances such as asbestos

label: Species & Forest
description: Issues related to species and forest protection, endangered species, control of the domestic illicit trade in wildlife products, and regulation of laboratory or performance animals

label: Land and Water Conservation
description: Issues related to land and water resource conservation

label: Environment, R&D
description: Issues related to research and development in environmental technology, not including alternative energy

label: Environment, Other
description: Issues related to other environmental subtopics

label: Energy, General
description: Issues generally related to energy policy, including appropriations for government agencies regulating energy policy

label: Nuclear
description: Issues related to nuclear energy, safety and security, and disposal of nuclear waste

label: Electricity
description: Issues related to general electricity, hydropower, and regulation of electrical utilities

label: Natural Gas & Oil
description: Issues related to natural gas and oil, drilling, oil spills and flaring, oil and gas prices, shortages and gasoline regulation

label: Coal
description: Issues related to coal production, use, trade, and regulation, including coal gasification and clean coal technologies

label: Alternative & Renewable
description: Issues related to alternative and renewable energy, biofuels, hydrogen and geothermal power

label: Conservation
description: Issues related to energy conservation and energy efficiency, including vehicles, homes, commercial use and government

label: Energy, R&D
description: Issues related to energy research and development

label: Energy, Other
description: Issues related to other energy subtopics

description: Issues related to immigration, refugees, and citizenship

label: Transportation, General
description: Issues related generally to transportation, including appropriations for government agencies regulating transportation policy

description: Issues related to mass transportation construction, regulation, safety, and availability

label: Highways
description: Issues related to public highway construction, maintenance, and safety

description: Issues related to air travel, regulation and safety of aviation, airports, air traffic control, pilot training, and aviation technology

description: Issues related to railroads, rail travel, rail freight, and the development and deployment of new rail technologies

description: Issues related to infrastructure and public works, including employment initiatives

label: Transportation, R&D
description: Issues related to transportation research and development

label: Transportation, Other
description: Issues related to other transportation subtopics

description: Issues related to general law, crime, and family issues

description: Issues related to child abuse, child pornography, sexual exploitation of children and parental kidnapping

description: Issues related to family issues, domestic violence, child welfare, family law

description: Issues related to domestic criminal and civil codes, including crimes not mentioned in other subtopics

label: Crime Control
description: Issues related to the control, prevention, and impact of crime

label: Law and Crime, Other
description: Issues related to other law, crime, and family subtopics

description: Issues generally related to social welfare policy

label: Elderly Assistance
description: Issues related to elderly issues and elderly assistance, including government pensions

label: Volunteer Associations
description: Issues related to domestic volunteer associations, charities, and youth organizations

label: Child Care

label: Social Welfare, Other
description: Issues related to other social welfare policy subtopics

label: Housing, General
description: Issues related generally to housing and urban affairs

label: Community Development
description: Issues related to housing and community development, neighborhood development, and national housing policy

label: Urban Development
description: Issues related to urban development and general urban issues

label: Rural Housing
description: Issues related to rural housing

label: Rural Development
description: Non-housing issues focused on economic, infrastructure, and other developments in non-urban areas

description: Issues related to housing for low-income individuals and families, including public housing projects and housing affordability programs

description: Issues related to housing for military veterans and their families, including subsidies for veterans

description: Issues related to housing for the elderly, including housing facilities for the handicapped elderly

label: Homeless

label: Housing, R&D
description: Issues related to housing and community development research and development

description: Issues related to consumer finance, mortgages, credit cards, access to credit records, and consumer credit fraud

description: Issues related to insurance regulation, fraud and abuse in the insurance industry, the financial health of the insurance industry, and insurance availability and cost

label: Bankruptcy

label: Small Businesses
description: Issues related to small businesses, including programs to promote and subsidize small businesses

label: Copyrights and Patents
description: Issues related to copyrights and patents, patent reform, and intellectual property

label: Disaster Relief

label: Tourism
description: Issues related to tourism regulation, promotion, and impact

label: Domestic Commerce, R&D

description: Issues related to nuclear weapons, nuclear proliferation, modernization of nuclear equipment

description: Issues related to military procurement, conversion of old equipment, and weapons systems evaluation

description: Issues related to military installations, construction, and land transfers

label: Reserve Forces
description: Issues related to military reserves and reserve affairs

label: Defense, Hazardous Waste
description: Issues related to military nuclear and hazardous waste disposal and military environmental compliance

description: Issues related to domestic civil defense, national security responses to terrorism, and other issues related to homeland security

description: Issues related to non-contractor civilian personnel, civilian employment in the defense industry, and military base closings

label: Defense, R&D
description: Issues related to defense research and development

label: Defense, Other
description: Issues related to other defense policy subtopics

description: Issues related to telephones and telecommunication regulation, infrastructure for high-speed internet, and other forms of telecommunication (e.g., mobile phones)

label: Broadcast
description: Issues related to the broadcast industry, published media, and control of the electromagnetic spectrum

description: Issues related to weather forecasting, oceanography, geological surveys, and weather forecasting research and technology

label: Computers
description: Issues relating to the computer industry, regulation of the internet, and cyber security

label: Technology, R&D
description: Issues related to space, science, technology, and communication research and development not mentioned in other subtopics.

label: Technology, Other
description: Issues related to other space, science, technology, and communication research and development

description: Issues generally related to foreign trade and appropriations for government agencies generally regulating foreign trade

description: Issues related to trade negotiations, disputes, and agreements, including tax treaties

label: Exports
description: Issues related to export regulation, subsidies, promotion, and control

label: Private Investments
description: Issues related to international private business investment and corporate development

label: Competitiveness

description: Issues related to tariffs and other barriers to imports, import regulation and impact of imports on domestic industries

label: Exchange Rates
description: Issues related to exchange rate and related issues

label: Foreign Trade, Other
description: Issues related to other foreign trade policy subtopics

description: Issues related to general international affairs and foreign aid, including appropriations for general government foreign affairs agencies

label: Foreign Aid
description: Issues related to foreign aid not directly targeting at increasing international development

label: Resources Exploitation
description: Issues related to international resources exploitation and resources agreements, law of the sea and international ocean conservation efforts

label: Developing Countries
description: Issues related specifically to developing countries (for Financial Issues see 1906)

description: Issues related to international finance and economic development, the World Bank and International Monetary Fund, regional development banks, sovereign debt and implications for international lending institutions

label: Western Europe
description: Issues related to Western Europe and the European Union

description: Issues related to human rights, human rights violations, human rights treaties and conventions, UN reports on human rights, crimes associated with genocide or crimes against humanity

label: International Affairs, Other
description: Issues related to other international affairs policy subtopics

label: Bureaucracy
description: Issues related to general government efficiencies and bureaucratic oversight

description: Issues related to postal services, regulation of mail, and post-civil service

label: Appointments
description: Issues related to nominations and appointments not mentioned elsewhere

label: Currency

description: Issues related to government procurement, government contractors, contractor and procurement fraud, and procurement processes and systems

label: Property Management
description: Issues related to government property management, construction, and regulation

description: Issues related to tax administration, enforcement, and auditing for both individuals and corporations

label: Scandals
description: Issues related to public scandal and impeachment

label: Branch Relations
description: Issues related to government branch relations, administrative issues, and constitutional reforms

label: Political Campaigns

description: Issues related to census and statistics collection by government

label: Capital City
description: Issues related to the capital city

label: National Holidays
description: Issues related to national holidays and their observation

label: Government Operations, Other
description: Issues related to other government operations subtopics

label: Public Lands, General
description: Issues related to general public lands, water management, and territorial issues

description: Issues related to water resources, water resource development and civil works, flood control, and research

description: Issues related to territorial and dependency issues and devolution
